articles.author: GMA Team
articles.title: Amazon Big Spring Sale 2024: Deals on outdoor furniture, vacuums and more - Good Morning America
articles.description: Amazon's Big Spring Sale has deals on Dyson vacuums, Keurig coffee makers, vegetable choppers and more, and "GMA" is spotlighting some of the top finds.

articles.author: James Stacey
articles.title: General Thomas Stafford – Gemini, Apollo, And Apollo-Soyuz Astronaut, Pilot, and Pioneer – Passes Away At 93 - HODINKEE
articles.description: Looking back on the opportunity we had to chat with an American legend.
articles.content: I've had an amazing run with Hodinkee in being able to speak with some truly astounding people, be it for an episode of Talking Watches, text interviews, or for Hodinkee Radio, and this chat with Gen… [+118 chars]
